indications.text: ozurdex ® corticosteroid indicated : treatment macular edema following branch retinal vein occlusion ( brvo ) central retinal vein occlusion ( crvo ) ( 1.1 ) treatment non-infectious uveitis affecting posterior segment eye ( 1.2 ) treatment diabetic macular edema ( 1.3 )

contraindications.text: ophthalmic intravitreal injection . ( 2.1 ) intravitreal injection procedure carried controlled aseptic conditions . ( 2.2 ) following intravitreal injection , patients monitored elevation intraocular pressure endophthalmitis . ( 2.2 )

warningsAndPrecautions: ozurdex ® ( dexamethasone intravitreal implant ) 0.7 mg supplied foil pouch 1 single-use plastic applicator , ndc 0023-3348-07. storage : store 15oc 30oc ( 59of 86of ) .
adverseReactions: ocular periocular infections ( 4.1 ) glaucoma ( 4.2 ) torn ruptured posterior lens capsule ( 4.3 ) hypersensitivity ( 4.4 )
name: OZURDEX
indications_original: OZURDEX ® is a corticosteroid indicated for: The treatment of macular edema following branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO) or central retinal vein occlusion (CRVO) ( 1.1 ) The treatment of non-infectious uveitis affecting the posterior segment of the eye ( 1.2 ) The treatment of diabetic macular edema ( 1.3 )
contraindications_original: For ophthalmic intravitreal injection. ( 2.1 ) The intravitreal injection procedure should be carried out under controlled aseptic conditions. ( 2.2 ) Following the intravitreal injection, patients should be monitored for elevation in intraocular pressure and for endophthalmitis. ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
OZURDEX
                     
                        ®
                     
                      (dexamethasone intravitreal implant) 0.7 mg is supplied in a foil pouch with 1 single-use plastic applicator, NDC 0023-3348-07.
                  
                     Storage: Store at 15oC to 30oC (59oF to 86oF).
adverseReactions_original: Ocular or periocular infections ( 4.1 ) Glaucoma ( 4.2 ) Torn or ruptured posterior lens capsule ( 4.3 ) Hypersensitivity ( 4.4 )
